pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Help15:Help screens" - Joomla! Documentation
textBeforeTable: Site Menu News feeds Category Manager New/Edit Weblink Category Manager New/Edit Contact Category Manager New/Edit Banner Category Manager New/Edit Content Category Manager New/Edit News feeds Category Manager Weblink Category Manager Contact Category Manager Banner Category Manager Content Category Manager Category Managers: New/Edit Category Managers Category managers Is the status at the moment 'To be reviewed'? You don't have to change the status in that case. Is the status at the moment 'Ready' or 'To be moved'? Change it to 'Modified by [name]' (replace [name] for your username at the Joomla! Docs Wiki) Did you notice a mistake or do think it's useful to add some extra information? You're welcome to modify the Help Screen. Please change the status of the modified Help Screen after you modified it: {{Chunk:No editor}} for No editor {{Chunk:TinyMCE}} for TinyMCE Content editors for proper categorisation read the instructions of Template:cathelp (talk, backlinks, edit) {{cpanelicon|Icon name}} is for Help screen icon
textAfterTable: Menus Menu # Help screen Path in Joomla! 1.5.x Joomla! 1.5.x help screen Status 6 Menu Manager Menus -> Menu Manager screen.menumanager.15 Ready 7 Menu Manager - New/Edit Menus -> Menu Manager -> New/Edit screen.menumanager.new.15 Ready 8 Trash Manager Menus/Content -> Trash Manager screen.trashmanager.15 Ready 9 Menu Item Manager Menus -> [Menu name] screen.menus.15 Ready 10 Menu Item Manager - New/Edit Menus -> [Menu name] -> New/Edit screen.menus.edit.15 Ready Content Menu # Help screen Path in Joomla! 1.5.x Joomla! 1.5.x help screen Status 11 Article Manager Content -> Article Manager screen.content.15 Ready 12 Article Manager - New/Edit Content -> Article Manager -> New/Edit screen.content.edit.15 Ready 13 Section Manager Content -> Section Manager
